  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>
            <entry>oai:atlas.fri.uni-lj.si:trubar1:uciteljska/111967</entry>
          </identifier>

          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="sl">Računske operacije z decimalnimi števili</string>
            <string language="en">Calculating with decimal fractions</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Berechnung mit Dezimalbrüchen</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Calcul avec les fractions décimales</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Cálculo com frações decimais</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Calcolando con le frazioni decimali</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Υπολογισμός με τα δεκαδικά μέρη</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">El calcular con las fracciones decimales</string>
          </title>
          <language>sl</language>
          <description>
            <string language="sl">Excelova preglednica z različnimi nalogami za usvajanje in utrjevanje znanja o računskih opracijah z decimalnimi števili, ki nudi takojšnjo povratno informacijo ter pojasnila v primeru napačnega reševanja. Učitelj lahko preglednico naloži na razredni računalnik. Izberi možnost Pogled -> Celoten zaslon. Varnostna nastavitev za makre mora biti nizka. Makri morajo biti omogočeni.</string>
            <string language="en">Excel spreadsheet that contains different exercises to present decimal fractions and how to do basic calculations.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">decimalno število</string>
            <string language="en">decimal number</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">število</string>
            <string language="en">number</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">seštevanje</string>
            <string language="en">addition</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">odštevanje</string>
            <string language="en">subtraction</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">množenje</string>
            <string language="en">multiplication</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">deljenje</string>
            <string language="en">division</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Übertreffen Sie Kalkulationstabelle, die 
unterschiedliche Übungen enthält, um Dezimalbrüche darzustellen und
wie zu grundlegende Berechnungen tun Sie.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Excelez le tableur qui contient différents 
exercices pour présenter les fractions décimales et comment à 
faites les calculs de base.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Excel o spreadsheet que contem exercícios 
diferentes para apresentar frações decimais e como a faça cálculos
básicos.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Eccella il foglio elettronico che contiene le 
esercitazioni differenti per presentare le frazioni decimali e come a 
faccia i calcoli di base.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Υπολογισμός με λογιστικό φύλλο (spreadsheet) 
Excel που περιέχει τις διαφορετικές ασκήσεις για να παρουσιάσει
τα δεκαδικά μέρη και πώς να κάνει τους βασικούς υπολογισμούς.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Sobresalga la hoja de balance que contiene 
diversos ejercicios para presentar fracciones decimales y cómo a haga
los cálculos básicos.</string>
          </description>

            <string language="x-mt-de">dezimale Zahl</string>
          </keyword>
